title: Finial, ca. 1925
description:
Lamp and shade
A) On low metal base with scroll-end feet, flat sided oval lamp support of molded green glass with crazed network of lines filled with white. Through this runs metal rod which supports two electrical bulb sockets. B) Half oval isinglas shade patterned in alternately light and dark brown curved striations flaring up from central red curve C)  Three part out flaring flat finial, metal

tombstone.epitaph:
Finial, ca. 1925. Glass base, metal, isinglas. 
1969-29-1-c
